Write it in.

If you want the editorial to draw attention to a subject, you want to tell me something, send a press release if you have any questions, send us a message right off the website. Messages from the COMMITMENT site are read in writing.If you want us to call you back or write, tell me how you can get in touch.♪ Keep in mind that the messages that come from this page are not published.

Dinamo Sinara performed a victory war in Stavropol

Sport10.02.2024 18:57
Comments0
10.02.2024 18:57

The Dinamo-Sinara Gandbolists today, 10 February, at the exit, were defeated by Stavropole at 31:26 in the next round of the second pre-stage Superliga. It's the fourth victory in the white and blue championship, the V102.RU. Dynamics met with their rivals for the fourth time this season. All three past matches were left behind by Oleg Kulashov, in that...
